mapper.select: SELECT p.brand_name p_brandName, p.name p_name, p.category_name p_categoryName, p.sn p_sn, p.sub_title p_subTitle, p.cover_picture p_coverPicture, p.description p_description, p.original_price p_originalPrice, p.sale_price p_salePrice, p.stock p_stock, p.weight p_weight, p.keywords p_keywords, p.detail_title p_detailTitle, p.detail_desc p_detailDesc, p.created_at p_createdAt FROM product p WHERE publish_status = 1;
SELECT pp.filename pp_filename FROM product p LEFT JOIN product_album a ON p.picture_album = a.id LEFT JOIN product_pictures pp ON a.id = pp.product_album_id WHERE p.id = #{productId}

SELECT pa.sku_code AS sku_codes, STRING_AGG(CONCAT(pat.name, ':', pa.attribute_value, ' ', pa.attribute_unit), ';') AS attributes FROM product_attribute_category pac LEFT JOIN product_attribute_type pat ON pat.attribute_category_id = pac.id LEFT JOIN product_attribute pa ON pa.attribute_type_id = pat.id WHERE pa.product_id = #{productId} GROUP BY pa.sku_code;

SELECT pat.name AS attribute_type_name, pat.id AS attribute_type_id FROM product_attribute_category pac LEFT JOIN product_attribute_type pat ON pat.attribute_category_id = pac.id WHERE pac.name = #{categoryName}
